version_description: Added 'High growth potential' and 'First time investor' discovery options.
All grid views now available as Discovery options, quicker access to infographic and easier to add a Portfolio.

Massive improvement to company infographic reports
(No longer loading in new browser window!)
Fixed 'Error Loading Companies' bug which some users were experiencing.
Fixed bug with infographics not displaying on slow connections, ability to refresh infographics.
Significant improvement to loading speed and memory usage of infographics.

Added Canada and New Zealand markets
(TSX, TSXV and NZX)

Improved Canada and New Zealand (TSX + NZX)
Updated app on-boarding
Fixed Google login on iOS 10

Very exciting update where we completely redesigned the app so it now mirrors the functionality and the UI of the Simply Wall St web platform!
- Portfolios now work inside the app
- New sections divide the app into three parts - stocks/portfolios/ideas
- Updated onboarding
Fixed Google login on iOS and updated tutorial.
Fixed Portfolio glitches and loading issues
Complete modern redesign of the user interface.

Added Portfolio News
Added OTC exchange in US
Preparation for new markets
Fixed Google Sign in bug.
Further improvements to login and registration.
Bug fixes and speed improvements.
Added European markets (Germany, Switzerland, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Sweden, Netherlands, Hungary, Denmark, Belgium, Russia, Poland, Norway, Finland, Portugal, Luxembourg, Ireland, Greece).
Fixed login and Portfolio bugs
Fixed Portfolio refreshing loop
Back button from Company to Ideas now returns to same position.

Powerful new features:

- Explore 61 new markets (Japan, China, Korea, Brazil plus many more!)
- See important warning signs for every stock with our new Risk Analysis
- Draw quicker insights with our freshly redesigned visual graphics
- Easily make conclusions with our new analysis check sentences
- Improved company analysis model
- Improved stock screener experience
- Improved company search experience

Plus various bug fixes to ensure a smooth app experience.
Fixed Google Login bug.

New mobile-friendly charts and better ways to assess a companyâ€™s management.
- A new set of line charts fully optimised for mobile. Now you can see earning history and analyst forecasts and additional data streams (free cash flow, cash from operation...)
- See who are top 25 shareholders
- Read detailed executive profiles and check their ownership
- Bug fixes & enhancements

Love the app? Rate us.
Have a question or suggestion? Let us know at support@simplywallst.com
Bug fixes & enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements

We're super excited about this new update:
- An all-new Dashboard to keep track of important changes and unique insights about your favourite companies
- Better search functionality to help you find companies faster
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Fixed a critical issue which users were logged out of the app.

We're super excited about this new update:
- An all-new Dashboard to keep track of important changes and unique insights about your favourite companies
- Better search functionality to help you find companies faster
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

In this new release, we have packed lots of new features and optimisation:
- Support Apple ID
- Dashboard is now ready in the app
- New Stock List page
- Faster company reports
- Faster search
